attributes.action: stop FORIEGN SITIZENS coming first on council registers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
why should foregn sitizens be housed befor british sitizens even when we could have bee on the council register months or even years longer,

i am a 22yr old mum who bidded on a house with the date of 14-10-08 on the general plus status & 6yrs befor that and the house was given to a foriegn sitizen who had the date jan09.
when i contacted the council about this matter they say they have no records of me ever bidding on the property 
!!!!!!!!!! IT'S WRONG !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
